name: Max
description: Max is a friendly and playful dog looking for a loving home.

name: Bella
description: Bella is a sweet and affectionate cat who enjoys cuddles.

name: Charlie
description: Charlie is an energetic and loyal dog ready for outdoor adventures.

name: Luna
description: Luna is a curious and independent cat who loves to explore her surroundings.

name: Pasha
description: This male dog was secured by the police in Wels and brought to our shelter by the animal rescue service. None of the people found are allegedly the dog's current owner. This sporty lad is initially reserved around strangers, but once he has taken someone to his heart, he is a cuddly and obedient fellow who has probably already had some training. Unfortunately, he does not enjoy other animals.

name: Cody
description: Unfortunately, this friendly boy has not yet learned to stay alone. Otherwise, Cody is a very friendly and open-minded guy who still needs some training.

name: Churro
description: Churro had probably already been through a few stops in his life before he ended up at our shelter. This lively youngster has had no training and has probably grown up quite isolated. He needs dog-experienced people to help him channel his energy into the right direction and discover the good things in life.

name: Carita
description: Carita was passed on several times and finally ended up at our shelter. The little dog is very friendly towards people and extremely communicative. Unfortunately, Carita is terrified of thunderstorms, heavy rain and wind, where she goes completely berserk and can no longer be calmed down. When she is in this phase, she also destroys objects in her fear. Otherwise she is an uncomplicated, friendly and lovable companion.

name: Ares
description: Ares is a basically friendly male dog, but he has had very little contact with other people and dogs in the last two years. He is docile and attentive and should definitely be taken to people with dog experience. He doesn't know children, so far he has only had two caregivers. He is also unfamiliar with cats and small animals.

name: Simba
description: Simba is an adventurous and active cat who loves to climb and explore.

name: Mittens
description: Mittens is a calm and gentle cat who enjoys lounging and being pampered.

name: Oliver
description: Oliver is a playful kitten who loves toys and interactive games.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is a curious and friendly dog who loves to sniff and explore the outdoors.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a loyal and protective dog who loves to be around his family.

name: Lily
description: Lily is a sweet and affectionate puppy who enjoys playing and cuddling.

name: Thumper
description: Thumper is a gentle and curious rabbit who loves to hop around and explore.

name: BunBun
description: BunBun is a fluffy and friendly rabbit who enjoys being petted and playing with toys.

name: Snowball
description: Snowball is a soft and calm rabbit who loves to be groomed and cuddled.

name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a curious and playful cat who loves to chase toys and explore new places.

name: Cleo
description: Cleo is a friendly and affectionate cat who loves to be the center of attention.

name: Shadow
description: Shadow is a calm and gentle cat who enjoys quiet time and cuddling.

name: Felix
description: Felix is a laid-back and friendly cat who loves to relax and be pampered.

name: Milo
description: Milo is an energetic and playful kitten who loves to climb and explore.

name: Frosty
description: Frosty is a small and sweet rabbit who loves to be held and petted.

name: Bella
description: Bella is a friendly and curious rabbit who loves to explore and play.

name: Cotton
description: Cotton is a large and gentle rabbit who enjoys lounging and being around people.

name: Thistle
description: Thistle is a fluffy and friendly rabbit who loves to be groomed and cuddled.

name: Hopper
description: Hopper is an active and curious rabbit who loves to hop around and explore.

name: Pepper
description: Pepper is a lively and playful rabbit who loves to interact with people and explore new environments.

name: Fluffy
description: Fluffy is a gentle and affectionate rabbit who enjoys being petted and spending time with humans.

name: Cinnamon
